data.why:
I wrote module Date::Say::Czech.

    It outputs dates as text, as it would speak it.

    For example: Date::Say::Czech::date_to_say(25, 6, 1986)

    will output

    dvacátého pátého června tisíc devět set osmdesát šest

    (it is in czech)

    next possible usage: Date::Say::Czech::time_to_say(time())

    will output actual date in text.

    I gladly answer optionally questions.

    Jiri Vaclavik <jiri.vaclavik@gmail.com>
